page.title: 03BACK SCHOOL
page.content: The local school is situated at the top of Cnoc an t-Sithein (Fairy Hill). It is a modern,flat-roofed two-storey building,which was officially opened on 31st January 1967.It houses a primary department whose catchment area is Gress, Back and Coll and a secondary department which caters for most of the pupils from Tong to North Tolsta.The primary role is 147 and the secondary role is 79.There are 7 teachers in the primary, 5 in the secondary and 9 itinerant specialist teachers.The secondary department provides general education for pupils for the first 2 years of their secondary education after which they transfer to the Nicolson Institute or the Lews Castle in Stornoway. Extra- curricular activities include netball, football and badminton.
